subject: United States Open (Golf)
Golf
lead_paragraph: At the end of a week of tape-measure drives and feather-soft putts, an unknown golfer — as Shaun Micheel once was — may stand in front of the stone clubhouse at Winged Foot and see his life change forever.
snippet: At the end of a week of tape-measure drives and feather-soft putts, an unknown golfer — as Shaun Micheel once was — may stand in front of the stone clubhouse at Winged Foot and see his life change forever.
